vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Baal = "lord"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) esp. lord, specif. as divine name, Baal
1a) supreme male divinity of the Phoenicians or Canaanites
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   señor, dueño; esposo; (2a)   deidad principal de los cananeos; (2b)   aldea; territorio de Simeón; (2c)   hijo de Reaías; tribu de Rubén; (2d)   hijo de Jehiel; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴力 这个字在原文的意思是 "主"
陽性專有名詞
1) 腓尼基人或迦南人的至高神
2) 流便支派的一個人 (代上 5:5)
3) 耶利之子; 掃羅的祖父 (代上 8:30)
專有名詞 地名
4) 西緬支派的一個城鎮 (代上 4:33), 大概就是巴拉比珥(書 19:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴力 这个字在原文的意思是 "主"
阳性专有名词
1) 腓尼基人或迦南人的至高神
2) 流便支派的一个人 (代上 5:5)
3) 耶利之子; 扫罗的祖父 (代上 8:30)
专有名词 地名
4) 西缅支派的一个城镇 (代上 4:33), 大概就是巴拉比珥(书 19:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.30;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732)
§ Baal = "lord"
n pr m
1) a Reubenite
2) the son of Jehiel and grandfather of Saul
n pr loc
3) a town of Simeon, probably identical to Baalath-beer

A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.5;
son of: Reaiah (H7211);
father of: Beerah (H0880)
§ Baal = "lord"
n pr m
1) a Reubenite
2) the son of Jehiel and grandfather of Saul
n pr loc
3) a town of Simeon, probably identical to Baalath-beer

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of ba.a.lat be.er (בַּעֲלַת בְּאֵר "Baalath-beer" H1192)
§ Baal = "lord"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a Reubenite
2) the son of Jehiel and grandfather of Saul
n pr loc
3) a town of Simeon, probably identical to Baalath-beer
